code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RankingList=()=>{const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);const fetchLeaderboard=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get(`${process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL}/api/leaderboard`);setUsers(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching leaderboard:',error);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchLeaderboard();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold text-center text-blue-700 mb-4",children:"Leaderboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"overflow-x-auto",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"min-w-full text-sm text-left text-gray-700 border border-gray-200",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{className:"bg-gray-100 text-gray-600 uppercase text-xs",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-3 border-b",children:"Rank"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-3 border-b",children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-3 border-b",children:"Total Points"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:users.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"hover:bg-gray-50",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-3 border-b",children:user.rank}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-3 border-b font-medium",children:user.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-3 border-b",children:user.totalPoints})]},user._id))})]})})]});};export default RankingList;
